interestingFact: India is the largest democracy in the world and has over 1,600 spoken languages.
France is the most visited country in the world and is famous for the Eiffel Tower.
Japan consists of more than 6,800 islands and is known for its advanced technology.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
Australia is both a country and a continent, and is famous for kangaroos.
Egypt is home to the Great Pyramids of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
